Name: [Duel] Ceramic Vase
Desc: Increases enemy Stun DMG Multiplier by <color=#2BAD00>40%</color>. When your squad is full, Agents can additionally trigger <color=#2BAD00>1</color> Chain Attacks on Stunned enemies.
Desc2: One of the weapons frequently wielded by the leading ladies in classic films, it's often used to deliver the decisive blow when the love interest is in a life-or-death battle with the villain.
